data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 2, Leeds have been awarded a penalty in Leeds...
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Lukasz Fabianski (West Ham) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 6, Goal! Mateusz Klich gives Leeds a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 10, West Ham have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Sebastian Haller gets his shot on target but fails to score for West Ham.
In Leeds, Jarrod Bowen of West Ham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 12, West Ham pushes forward through Sebastian Haller, whose finish on goal is saved.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Leeds.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Leeds are coming forward and Rodrigo Moreno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
West Ham's Jarrod Bowen gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Michael Oliver awards Leeds a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Said Benrahma (West Ham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Leeds needs to be cautious. West Ham have an attacking throw-in.
Tomas Soucek (West Ham) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Elland Road.
In the minute 25, Great play from Jarrod Bowen to set up the goal.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for West Ham at Elland Road.
In the minute 27, Michael Oliver signals a Leeds throw-in in West Ham's half.
Rodrigo Moreno for Leeds drives towards goal at Elland Road. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
West Ham are pushing forward but Said Benrahma's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Leeds.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 33, At Elland Road, Ezgjan Alioski has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leeds just outside West Ham's area.
Liam Cooper (Leeds) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 37, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leeds's Jack Harrison is whistled for offside at Elland Road.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 38, West Ham have a goal kick.
Leeds to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
Free kick Leeds.
In the minute 40, Leeds's Patrick Bamford goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to West Ham's area.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 45, Leeds drives forward and Luke Ayling gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Helder Costa is replacing Jack Harrison for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 46, Marcelo Bielsa is making the team's second substitution at Elland Road with Jamie Shackleton replacing Ezgjan Alioski.
Patrick Bamford of Leeds gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In the minute 49, Michael Oliver signals a West Ham throw-in in Leeds's half.
Throw-in high up the field for West Ham in Leeds.
Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leeds's half?
In the minute 53, West Ham drive upfield and Sebastian Haller gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
West Ham's Sebastian Haller is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to West Ham.
In Leeds West Ham drive forward through Said Benrahma. His shot is on target but it's saved.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, West Ham have a dangerous throw-in.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 58, Michael Oliver signals a West Ham throw-in in Leeds's half.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of West Ham.
Throw-in for West Ham at Elland Road.
In the minute 61, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leeds.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, West Ham have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
West Ham's Said Benrahma misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leeds.
Leeds will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from West Ham.
Said Benrahma of West Ham gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards Leeds a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Raphinha (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Patrick Bamford (Leeds) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for West Ham at Elland Road.
In the minute 68, In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Leeds West Ham attack through Said Benrahma. The finish is off target, however.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Leeds's Kalvin Phillips gets in a shot on goal at Elland Road. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Mateusz Klich for Leeds drives towards goal at Elland Road. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Leeds in the half of West Ham.
Michael Oliver signals a West Ham throw-in in Leeds's half.
Jarrod Bowen for West Ham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Leeds make their third substitution with Tyler Roberts replacing Patrick Bamford.
Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 75, West Ham's Pablo Fornals breaks free at Elland Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Free kick West Ham.
In the minute 77, Fabian Balbuena (West Ham) strikes at Elland Road but his header is cleared.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 78, Leeds's Raphinha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Ham defender.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for West Ham close to the penalty box.
Angelo Ogbonna heads in to make it 1-2 at Elland Road.
In the minute 80, That's a fine assist from Aaron Cresswell.
Michael Oliver awards West Ham a goal kick.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 83, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
The away team have replaced Said Benrahma with Mark Noble. This is the first substitution made today by David Moyes.
In the minute 85, Leeds's Tyler Roberts has run offside.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Moyes (West Ham) is making a second substitution, with Ben Johnson replacing Jarrod Bowen.
In the minute 87, West Ham's Sebastian Haller gets in a shot on goal at Elland Road. But the effort is unsuccessful.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
West Ham apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Sebastian Haller but the ball hits the post!
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Michael Oliver signals a West Ham throw-in in Leeds's half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Leeds push forward at Elland Road and Rodrigo Moreno gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the West Ham defence.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leeds.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
Mark Noble (West Ham) gets a yellow card.
Robert Snodgrass is replacing Pablo Fornals for the away team.
